DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass whether radiographic osteoarthritis severity ( OA ; Kellgren-Lawrence scale ) associate self-reported improvement pain non-surgical treatment ( physiotherapy , pain killer , injection , treatment ) . The hypothesis radiographic OA severity inversely associate self-reported improvement .
DOC.brief_title: Non-surgical Treatment Knee Osteoarthritis - Comparison Effects 2200 Patients
